attributes.action: Force OFCOM to change the Amateur Radio Foundation Licence conditions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
* Initiate an immediate moratorium on the issuing of the Foundation Licence.

* That we agree  that the Foundation Licence syllabus is fine in principle but is not being 
realised in practice.

* That the tutors for the Foundation Licence have to be be examined & judged to
ascertain that their intentions are to promote a high standard of operating proficiency
and technical knowledge within the traditions of the previous granting of amateur radio
licences in this country, and not merely trying to make money.

* That if sufficient complaints are received by OFCOM that the standard of operating 
of licencee's known to have come from a particular club of tutor, that the club or tutor
can be struck off.

* That a time limit of no more than five years be set as the maximum time that the
Foundation Licence be held.
